name: Gentle Cleanser
description: A gentle, non-foaming cleanser suitable for all skin types. Removes makeup and impurities while maintaining skin's natural moisture barrier.
ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Ceramides, Centella Asiatica Extract, Panthenol

name: Hydrating Moisturizer
description: Rich yet lightweight moisturizer that provides deep hydration for dry and normal skin. Non-comedogenic formula.
ingredients: Hyaluronic Acid, Squalane, Ceramides, Shea Butter, Niacinamide

name: Vitamin C Serum
description: Powerful brightening serum with 15% Vitamin C. Helps reduce dark spots and improve skin tone.
ingredients: L-Ascorbic Acid, Ferulic Acid, Vitamin E, Panthenol, Glycerin
